article: When you speak, write a letter or make a telephone call, your words carry a message. People communicate with words. Do you think you can communicate without words? Other things can also carry messages. For example, a sign at the  bus stop  helps you know which bus you can take here. A sign on the wall of your school helps you  _  the library. Signs on the doors tell you  _  to go in or out. Have you ever noticed that there are lots of signs round you and that you receive messages  _  them all the time?
